name: Skyler Dash
description:
Project Summary

Current Status: Early Development

Core Features: 

  • High speed arcade
  •  Collection and exploration
  • Procedural generated level

What this game IS NOT:

  • A space shooter, I am not planing to have shooting mechanics, but focusing on the challenge of flying through obstacles.
  • An RPG (see first point of core features)

What this game tries to deliver:

  • The delight of high speed flight in space
  • The "I am a space ace" moment like those in the movies where the heroes fly through an asteroid field without crashing!

Target Platforms: PC, so far.

I Need Your Help!

This is early development and I still working on the concept. You can download for free the current demo, which is an endless run from one area to the next. Please share your experience and your thoughts about the game. Also let me know it there are some technical or performance issues and which are your computer specifications in that case.

There is a discussion board!

What's about?

You will need to collect the glowing orbs to open a gate. Once open an arrow appear showing you the way to that gate, which will make jump into the next area.

Controls

This game is designed to be played with a controller, but still will work fine with keyboard.

The current default configuration is for X Box controller as following:

  • Left Analog Controller: Pitch and Roll
  • Right Analog Controller: Yaw and Speed
  • The Trigger buttons: also allows you to control the speed in an alternative way
  • Left Bumper: Gravity Pulse (super high speed for some seconds)
  • Right Bumper: Gravity Brake (from 1000 to 0 in 1 second :) )
  • A button: Restart

In case you have a different controller or keyboard:
You can still configure the inputs from the Unity Launcher, not all the inputs are needed (I forgot to remove those, sorry) but with the previous description you can figure out which are the right ones!
